name: handknit Alligator Baby Hat
description:
Handknit by me, Shelli Akers.  This hat is 100% merino wool,  and custom made to order. if you have a particular color that you would like the gator to be other than green just let me know at check out :)

I will make and ship your custom item within 5-7 days of your purchase.  If you are in a rush just let me know and I will try to speed up the process the best that I can.
*size 0-3 mos. is now available for immediate shipping! :)

100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back :)

name: handknit Newborn Sockies custom color and fiber
description:
Handknit by me, Shelli Akers.  The size is newborn and you have your choice of color and fiber, ie:  neutral tweed wool, pink wool, blue sky cotton.  Totally custom.  You may also choose seed stitch cuff, smooth or ribbing(as shown).

You can email me or leave me a note at checkout to specify your choices.

Item will be custom made and shipped within 5-7 days of your purchase. :)

100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.

name: cabled merino wool mini wallet faded red
description:
Handknit by me, Shelli Akers... mini wallets are one of my favorite things to knit! i've added 3 vertical rows of simple cables for texture and interest and also an extra special pearly button. my mom sends me bunches of buttons from morro bay, ca and that is where this one is from.

i've used malabrigo 100% merino wool. it is naturally faded in spots which i think, gives it a vintagey look. the wallet measures 3.25"x3" and would be great for coins, memory cards for digital cameras and any other little item you'd like to stash in style :)

the color is more of a traditional red than the photos are showing.

...this item is ready to ship!

100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back :)

name: Red Velvet and Chocolate Floral Cupcake Pincushions set of 2
description:
handmade by me, Shelli Akers...

The Red Velvet crochet/knit pincushion is 2.5'x 2", made with cotton yarn for the base,100% merino wool for the top(icing). 

The Chocolate Floral is 4" x 3" with a knitted base,the top is handsewn using the ruffled cuff of a brand new pair of infant knit leggings.

one of a kind set

ready to ship!

100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back!

name: Knitted Leaves set of 3
description:
handknit by me, shelli akers...

I have used cotton yarn, alpaca sock yarn and 100% wool yarn to knit these sweet leaves... just waiting to embellish your latest project or to display.

The green leaf features a special little pearly heart button. Two of the leaves measure 4" from stem to point, the smallest is 3.5".

ready to ship!

100% satisfaction guaranteed or your money back.  :)
